name: DeRailed (Flalcon, KAJ7, Hawkigamer1)
description:
In the wildest of wests, there are no laws, not even the basic laws of time itself. With your ability to stop time, jump from train to train in this wildly frustrating adventure!

*Please note that we take great joy in your suffering. Thank you for playing!*

Hurt in the making:

27 Cookies

12 Pepsis

147 Commits

KAJ7   -  UI and Level Design and Game Systems

hawkigamer1  -  Game Systems and Level Design

Flalcon  -  Sound Design

Alexzen  -  Dynamic Music
